mapper.select: SELECT i.investment_code, i.member_id, i.store_code, i.investment_request_judge_code, i.total_category_code, i.member_id_seller, i.investment_image, i.investment_like, i.investment_achievement_money, i.search_count, i.invest_count, i.securities_classification, i.investment_display_date, i.investment_reg_date, i.investment_report, i.basic_fee, i.contract_fee_rate, i.contract_file, i.invest_judge_situation, i.invest_achievement_percent, i.investment_subject, i.investment_amount, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, i.investment_image, i.investment_company FROM investment AS i

SELECT i.investment_code, i.member_id, i.store_code, i.investment_request_judge_code, i.total_category_code, i.member_id_seller, i.investment_image, i.investment_like, i.investment_achievement_money, i.search_count, i.invest_count, i.securities_classification, i.investment_display_date, i.investment_reg_date, i.investment_report, i.basic_fee, i.contract_fee_rate, i.contract_file, i.invest_judge_situation, i.invest_achievement_percent, i.investment_subject, i.investment_amount, i.investment_deadline, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, i.investment_image, i.investment_company, ic.investment_content_code, ic.member_id, ic.investment_code, ic.member_id_admin, ic.project_introduction, ic.investment_introduction_image, ic.market_analysis, ic.market_analysis_image, ic.major_financial_information, ic.major_financial_information_image, ic.risk, ic.risk_image, ic.major_manpower, ic.major_manpower_image, ic.patent_award_details, ic.patent_award_details_image, ic.etc_invest_content, ic.etc_invest_content_image, ic.registration_date FROM investment AS i INNER JOIN investment_content AS ic ON i.member_id_seller = ic.member_id WHERE i.investment_code = #{investmentCode};

/* 추천순, 최신순, 인기순, 모집금액순, 마감임박순 정렬 */ SELECT investment_code, invest_achievement_percent, investment_subject, investment_amount, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, investment_image, investment_company FROM investment
ORDER BY invest_achievement_percent DESC
ORDER BY investment_reg_date DESC
ORDER BY investment_like DESC
ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
ORDER BY investmentDeadlineCnt ASC
ORDER BY invest_achievement_percent DESC
/* 업종 조회 */ SELECT c.company_business_type_code AS companyBusinessTypeCode, c.member_id AS memberId, c.business_type AS businessType FROM company_business_type AS c

/* 자본시장법 범위충족기준 조회 */ SELECT l.law_satistify_code AS lawSatistifyCode, l.member_id AS memberId, l.law_satistify_reason AS lawSatistifyReason, l.law_satistify_whether AS lawSatistifyWhether, l.code_reg_day AS codeRegDay FROM law_satistify_reason AS l
